title: Baked Garlic Parmesan Chicken
directions: Step 1:	Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Step 2:	Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Step 3:	In a bowl, blend the olive oil and garlic.
Step 4:	In a separate bowl, mix the bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, basil, and pepper.
Step 5:	Dip each chicken breast in the oil mixture, then in the bread crumb mixture.
Step 6:	Arrange the coated chicken breasts in the prepared baking dish, and top with any remaining bread crumb mixture.
Step 7:	Bake 30 minutes in the preheated oven, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear.
